DOC.brief_title: Value-based Cognitive Behavioral Therapy Prevention Chronic Whiplash-associated Disorders
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective present study test whether specifically tailor value-based cognitive-behavioural therapy program ( V-CBT ) able prevent development persistent disability , pain , psychological distress deliver within first three month whiplash injury . Methods . The current study two-armed randomize control study crossover design . Group A schedule V-CBT within one week randomization group B delay onset 3 month randomization .
DOC.criteria: 18 65yearsold WAD level III . 3months postinjury Disability least one important life domain ( ≥ 5 pain disability index ) moderate level pain ( average pain intensity ≥ 4 NRS scale ) . Meet least one psychological risk criterion : Elevated level pain catastrophizing , fearavoidancebeliefs , symptom anxiety and/or depression , posttraumatic stress symptom .
